Intro.Message: Mordern customers will go online to book what they want when they want it
Intro.BookingOutside: Of Bookings done outside of business hours

About.HeaderDescription3: System to never miss a booking & book more clients
About.MessageContent_1: An SEO friendly and professionally designed website that makes your business stand out on the internet. Google Map & Clients Evaluation features are integrated to provide all the needed information for your clients to pick out your services online
About.MessageContent_4: Real time online reporting about booking transactions, payments, and clients satisfaction. Available KPIs dashboard with visualized charts & graphs that help owners quickly gauge business performances and what need to be done to continuosly improve
About.MessageContent_2: Online payments go directy to your bank account via secured payment portals to guarantee bookings and instantly receive booking confirmation You can just focus on providing the best services without having to worry about managing bookings, payments, and cash
About.MessageContent_5: The system automatically sends to clients reminders about upcoming apppointments and notifications when a booking is made/changed so you don't have to
About.MessageHeader_3: An Online Booking Site that does business 24/7
About.MessageContent_3: Your website not only displays information but also does business for you by accepting online booking & payment in real time 24/7. Clients can go online whenever they want inside or outside of the regular business hours to select a suitable date & time, make the payment, and instantly receive booking confirmation
About.MessageContent_6: The system automatically sends reminders to clients about an upcoming appointments and/or notifications when a booking is made, changed, or canceled so you're always in control of your business without having to attend the phone all the times

Feature.Header: Ludiino is an Online Booking Solution that works for multiple industries
Feature.Description: Whether you own a Beauty Salon, a Sport Center, an Automobile Dealership or a Medical Clinic, you will certainly need an online booking software for your clients to book & pay for the provided services, and
Feature.Description3: is the only solution for all your needs

MainContent.FreebieIntro: Get your business started online for free with an online booking website that does business for you 24/7
MainContent.NewbieIntro: Take advantage of Online Payment feature to receive payment online and not having to worry about cash managment
MainContent.BiggeIntro: Manage Staff Scheduling with ease & create Online Promotional Campaigns that send out discount codes to attract new customers
MainContent.HulkIntro: Sell not only your services but also your merchandise on your website to maximize your revenues
MainContent.PaymentMethod_OnlineAndStore: Payment Method: Pay Online and Pay At Store

FAQs.Title: FAQs
FAQs.Intro: Here are some frequently asked questions related to the Ludiino Online Booking & Scheduling solution
FAQs.Q_HowSignUpLudiinoSolution: How do I sign up for Ludiino solution?
FAQs.A_HowSignUpLudiinoSolution: Register for a Ludiino account at the top right corner of the Home page, fill in the required info to start
FAQs.Q_WhenStartLudiinoForBusiness: When can I start using Ludiino solution for my business?
FAQs.A_WhenStartLudiinoForBusiness:
Depends on the package you select! If it's the Freebie pacakge, you can use it as soon as your account is created
For more advanced packages, you can use it once payment is done
FAQs.A_HowMakePayment: 2 ways: via credit cards (prefered method) or bank transfer. We accept all major credit cards
FAQs.Q_WhenMySiteCreated: When is my own website created for clients to make bookings on it?
FAQs.A_WhenMySiteCreated: Your own website will be automatically created once payment is completed. You will then proceed to add services + price for your clients to book
FAQs.Q_IntegrateExistingSite: If I already have an existing website for my business, can ludiino solution be integrated with it?
FAQs.A_IntegrateExistingSite: Absolutely and we can provide technical support for the intergation
FAQs.Q_CanUseMultiple: Can I use Ludiino solution for multiple at the same time?
FAQs.A_CanUseMultiple: Absolutely! You can just click 'Add More Store' button in your merchant portal to add more and follow a simple process to set it up

LudiinoSolution.Title: Who can use Ludiino Online Booking & Appointment Scheduling System?

Features.Title: Online Booking & Appointment Scheduling Features
Features.Intro: Great features are packaged into a powerful online solution that creates competitive advantages for your business in the digital age

FreeWebsite.Title: A Free Professional Website
FreeWebsite.Info:
A free professionally design with SEO enabled website that makes your business stand out on the internet.

Google Map & Client Evaluation features are integrated to provide all the needed information for your client to pick out your services online

OnlineBooking.Title: An Online Booking site that does business 24/7
OnlineBooking.Info:
Your website not only displays information but also does business for you by accepting online booking & payment in real time 24/7.

Client can go online whenever they want inside or outside of the regular business hours to select a suitable date & time, make payment, and instantly receive booking confirmation

Payment.Title: Online and/or Offline Payment
Payment.Info: Easily set up flexible payment methods as online and/or offline. With online payment, clients can make payment via secured third party payment portals directly to your bank account thus let you focus on providing the best services without having to worry about managing bookings, payments, and cash

ShedulingManagement.Title: Staff Scheduling Management
ShedulingManagement.Info:
Quick & easy to schedule working date/hour per staff as well as to assign them to pre-booking appointments.

Customers can now book a preferred staff to provide their requested serivces. Readily available online report on staff working schedule, the number of services provided as well as client satifisfaction

Appointment.Title: Other Cool Features that help you
Appointment.Intro: To properly manage and grow your businesses.

Integrate.Title: Integrate Booking with Social Network
Integrate.Info: Booking feature is integrated into your social networks like facebook and/or instagram for clients to conveniently  book via multiple online channels to help your business leverage on all digital channels to get new clients & ultmately more bookings

CheckInManagement.Title: Check In Management
CheckInManagement.Info: Quickly checkin and/or checkout pre-booking customers by scaning booking code to significantly reduce unnessesary wait time and to spend more time taking care of your clients to earn customer appreciation

Marketing.Title: Online Marketing & Promotional Campaigns
Marketing.Info: Multiple ways to create various Promotional Marketing Campaigns with discount codes sent via email/sms directly to your targeted clients to attract new clients and keep old clients coming back for more.

Dashboard.Title: Dashboard & Reports
Dashboard.Info: Real time online reporting about booking transactions, payments, and client satisfaction. Available KPIs dashboard with visualized charts & graphs that help owners quickly gauge business performances and what need to be done to continuosly improve

Notifications.Title: Auto Notification & Reminder
Notifications.Info: The system automatically sends reminders to client about an upcoming appointments and/or notifications when a booking is made, changed, or canceled so you're always in control of your business without having to attend the phone all the times

Cancellation.Title: Booking Cancellation
Cancellation.Info: Completely replace the hassles of making multiple phone calls with a few clicks to cancel/edit a booking online. A cancellation confirmation is automatically sent to both buyers & seller to finalize the transaction
